name: The Survey (itch) (Rishi :))
description:
You come home from work to find an email survey in your inbox.

Hello! this is one of my first ever text based games, it's still in development so this is just a proof of concept or a demo, there are a good amount of choices you can make and I tried my best to have a couple good scares. I hope you like it, let me know what I can change or improve.

Updates:

Update 1: fixed a puzzle and some bugs
